PerformanceScriptTimingInvokerType.summary: NOTE Experimental The invokerType read-only property of the interface returns a string value indicating the type of feature that, when invoked, ran the script.
PerformanceScriptTimingInvokerType.value: A string indicating the invoker type of the script entry point. Possible values are:The structure of the value depends on the script's invokerType value. Check out the invoker page for more details.
